# customMirror

**Instance Property**

A mirror that reflects the dictionary.

## Declaration

```swift
var customMirror: Mirror { get }
```

## Describing a Dictionary

- **description**: A string that represents the contents of the dictionary.
- **debugDescription**: A string that represents the contents of the dictionary, suitable for debugging.
- **hash(into:)**: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.

items.description: A string that represents the contents of the dictionary.
items.name: description

items.description: A string that represents the contents of the dictionary, suitable for debugging.
items.name: debugDescription

items.description: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.
items.name: hash(into:)
